content.detailedDescription:
I took 3 photos from the 5th floor of the mitsukoshi department store in hoshigaoka, nagoya city, japan. i thought as close as i could to the glass, there was netting about a meter from the window. only later i saw what looks like 5 "orbs". however, i admit this is most likely a reflection of some kind of spotlight, possibly one with leds. there is also an oval pattern again suggesting a spot light reflection. however, i am surprised there could be any reflection as i took the photo right against the glass and there are no other reflections apparent at all. i was hoping someone could tell definitely if the orbs are in the sky or reflected in the glass. they appear to obscure the netting, so lending weight to the likelihood they are a reflection, but then again if they are bright perhaps they would appear to get around the netting.  also i thought it was worth posting in case there were any other observations (i know orbs have been spotted over japan recently.) to be honest i personally doubt aliens would be visible to us (due to advanced technology), but i've seen the footage of orb like entities which might be some other interesting natural phenomena so i thought i would post it anyway. if it turns out to be just a reflection perhaps the image might be useful as a good example of a non-ufo.

they are also pretty high res pictures so i hope that helps. i haven't altered them in anyway.
content.summary: 5 orbs in formation.

content.detailedDescription: Our family was driving to drive in movies down a country road an out came a silverish disk, like a big round spinning vehicle, my father drove the car faster, i looked.. an watched it next to the car but about 50ft to the right my sister was about 6yrs old i was 8, we still both remember this as at the movies it apeared over the screen this time 40 to 50 folks saw this then it didnt fly away it dissapeared ......
content.summary: Large craft like a typical disk but so scarey because i was close

content.detailedDescription: I was 5 years old but it still remains in my mind like it was yesterday and i have to admit it has shaped my life since.It was the the year 1975 i lived in what was then the koa grounds a trailer park on the highest part of golden b.C just along the trans canada highway.I remember it was very windy and of course being a child i decided to fly my kite i remember letting out so much line that i lost site of it through the cloud cover.My mom was yelling from the door to come inside and at that time my line broke i stood there hopeing that i would catch sight of it but i didn't so i went inside. about an hour or two latter the weather settled down a bit but still a little cloudy and somewhat dark out i snuck out to go look for my kite i decided to go north to the tree line were i thought the wind would have taken it at that point i started to feel like something or someone was near like a presence and i then realized there was an eerie silence that's when i looked up and seen a glowing electric like ball emerge from the cloud cover it was decending to the point where it was literally right over our trailer i was frozen and could not move i could not yell out i could not do anything..Suddenly it seemed, it was the next morning! i was in my bed but all i remember was my kite so i got up and of course no one was up yet i went out to the north tree line and it seemed like i knew exactly where it was i walked over to one tree out of about 60 or more went on the other side of it and there it was right then and there i remembered everything that happened the night before but could not remember after seeing the globe walking back to the trailer or going to bed the funny thing was i also woke up with my clothes on from the night before..I am now 43 and have been having health problems mom and my sister too and since then we all have been diagnosed with ehlers-danlos syndrome a connective tissue disorder which is inherited faulty collagen that effects strength and elasticity of muscles,skin,joints,major organs and blood vessels. i don't believe that they may have caused our disorder but may want to study us to understand us that's all. i want to thank you for allowing me to have such a site and allow me to finally share my story..Jason
content.summary: Glowing globe like. no actual lines or distinctive shape other than to say like a spark from electricity but a  not a line a globe

content.detailedDescription: My apt located in nyc uws on 28th floor  with an unobstructed view of the entire east side skyline, and no window treatments. just observing the beautiful night sky from the balcony i noticed 2 objects hovering in the sky just stationery at first. i photographed the objects then they moved closer to the building. after a bit they flew low and close to the building. no noise. very big. lots of lights. living in the center of nyc in lui of the past horrors there is no way these objects were flying undetected. so no fear but this had been going on since 2009 and i had lived there unremarkably since 2002. there were many strange objects in the skies and i would be curious to know if others have documented any events. i have many photos of whatever these flying things were. some smaller odd shapef objects  just flew in a circle all night long every night. media to follow under separate cover.
content.summary: Strange objects over uws nyc..

content.detailedDescription: I was on highway 205 in tracy ca. on may 3 2014. earlier in the day i saw a triangle on 680 in sunol but was unable to get a picture. on my way home at 330 that morning as i was traveling on 205 in tracy i saw a bright light coming from my left side just as i passed macarthur.  i thought it was a helicopter because it was traveling so low. as it got closer i could see the triangle shape but it was not the same as the one earlier.  the one earlier was a boxed shape and shaped like a boomerang. this one was a flat full triangle.  i took a couple of pictures as it came towards me and one as it went over the top of my car with the sunroof open. it headed over the altamont and disappeared in a couple of seconds. the picture of it coming towards me has to be spread open to see the shape. you won't see the whole craft only the lights in the triangle form and the picture of it going over the car you can't see a shape only a weird light form. the last picture is of it flying over a large distribution warehouse on the right side of the car after it passed over.  i see them all the time, i don't know why. i've even had one stop 50 yards in front of me totally invisible. i felt is presence in front of me, i couldn't see it i just knew it was there some how. it sat there for a couple of seconds as did i because i was so in awe i couldn't move. it took off leaving a blue steak behind it that looked like a huge blow torch.
content.summary: Came from the left looking like a helicopter as it passed over my carrier could see it wasa triangle

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:20 pm on 5/14/2013 while walking our dog in bethel henschel park in east sacramento we witnessed a very large, very brightly lit object materialize over the neighborhood treeline towards the northeast in the direction of the american river and beyond.

immediately upon materializing it dropped rapidly in a vertical line disappearing behind the treeline. it was silent and made no sound.  it appeared to be an object very brightly lit by white light with some blue light as well. it dropped out of the sky over the treeline so fast that it left a bluish white light trail behind it.  the whole thing transpired in 2 seconds max.

it didn't appear to be a falling star as it was too large, too  low and it's descent was too vertical with absolutely no horizontal movement that we could see at all. there were no sparks or flames or anything else that would indicate it as a natural phenomena.

an unmarked helicopter, just moments prior, had flown over the park. seconds after the object dropped and disappeared behind the treeline, the helicopter doubled back and began circling over the spot where the object had dropped down.
content.summary: Bright white/blue lit object with rapid vertical descent

content.detailedDescription:
When i was about televe years old i saw a ufo down the street i was living
on. one summer evening back in 1980 i had this strange feeling to go to the
front living room window and look to the west. i saw a very bright light in
the sky and it looked like something was burning white hot. my older brother
was in the bathroom and i went over to knock on the door to get him out of the bathroom so i could show him the strange light in the sky. he didn't come out
, so i went to the garage and hopped onto one of my bikes and road down the 
street towards the bright light. as i road down the street i notice that the light was starting to descend downwards. when i got to the end of the street
i stopped and looked up. there was a round shaped object about hundred feet above my head. there was no sound which was very odd. there was a string of rectangular shaped lights of different colors. the lights were arranged in a circular pattern. the colors were green, yellow and red. the colors seem to rotate around the circle. the object hovered above me for about a minute.
the lights turned off and it seemed that the object acended rapidly.
a few seconds later the lights turned on again but the object was high up in the sky. the object then rapidly flew off to the south and i lost sight of
it. i road my bike back home and told my brother about what i saw.
he was skeptical. years later when i was visiting one of my brothers' friends we happened to get on the topic of ufos. his friend told me about 
a ufo he had seen a few years ago. i was supprised that the description of what he saw was the same as what i saw. the same color lights and shape.
at the time of my sighting he lived about five miles south of my home.
he couldn't remember the exact date and time of his sighting.
this was about 34 years ago and i still remember it. i have no idea why
the object was in a suburban neighborhood.
content.summary: Evening sighting in ohio.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed a moving object across desert, hovering then taking off.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating light moving

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside talking with my nephew watching his kids play it was right at dusk when i noticed a light just over the house moving fairly quick and pointed it out to my nephew just as i did he shouted look at the other 3 coming behind it  with no formation at all they we're moving faster than any passenger  jet i've seen it was only 25 to 30 seconds and they disappeared . being somewhat of an amateur astronomer  i've never seen anything like it.I will have trouble sleeping  not knowing what we saw.
content.summary: 1 light followed by 3 others  with apparent  formation with no sound or trail no flashing lights at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: On saturday, may 3, 2014, had a group of friends over boiling crawfish when saw bright red/green light in sky traveling in a straight line from katy tx direction toward tomball tx direction. 1st thought maybe a helicopter, but no noise and lights were unusual, due to brightness. as an electrical engineer i would say the lights were more like extra bright led's. lights were not flashing as lights on an aircraft would be doing.It traveled in our view for about 30 seconds from the time we saw it directly overhead as it disappeared over the tree lined horizon. this was also seen by my son, an engineer at an austin, tx computer company, and his wife. don't know if any of the other 15+ persons at the party saw it. at first dismissed it, but after a while realized it was something uncommon.
content.summary: Extremely bright solid red & green light-could not tell what it was.

content.detailedDescription:
Just before 10pm, i was driving my friend back to galesburg from kalamazoo, mi. as i usually do, i turned south onto fullerton ave from west michigan st. to drop him off. he opened the door to get out, but then we both noticed a glowing red orb in the sky ahead of us, just over the trees, on the left side of the road. the object looked to be at least a few blocks away. 
i said, "what is that?"
my friend replied, "maybe it's just a plane?"
 we both got a peculiar feeling. he closed the door and we drove south down fullerton ave toward the object. luckily, there's an empty field a block away on the south side of blake blvd, adjacent to where we parked the car on fullerton. we turned east at the intersection of fullterton ave and blake blvd and parked the car on the south side of blake blvd, next to the field. when we pulled up we realized the object was closer than we thought and was more or less hovering over the field. we then began observing  a decent sized object that looked like a ball of fire in the sky. 
my friend and i agree that we observed the following:
it flickered somewhat like a candle and was bright orange. the object was very low to the ground and looked to be well below the cloud ceiling at 1k-3k. the sky was completely overcast at the time. the object we observed did not have wings, a tail, any visible means of propulsion, any cylindrical shapes, right of way lights, strobe lights, a propellor, jet engines, etc. the object was not an airplane, helicopter, ultra-light aircraft, etc. it didn't resemble any known aircraft. the only light coming from the object was an overwhelming red/orange/amber glow that flickered and didn't appear to be attached to anything, but was the object itself. the object wasn't blowing around in the wind, like a chinese lantern, but seemed to be hovering around very slowly, under it's own control. the wind speed at the time was 7 mph from east to west. the object didn't make a sound; it was completely silent the entire time we observed it. as we started walking toward the object, it appeared to be hovering northeast, in a straight line. however, my friend says the object was flying southesat in a straight line. we demonstrated to each other that we both knew which direction north was from where we were. we don't know how to reconcile the difference in direction, but agree the object was hovering in straight lines. i estimated it's angle of elevation to be 40-45 degrees at the time. it remained at a near constant angle of elevation. twice or three times during the time we observed it, it appeared to stop and remain stationary for short periods of time. 
i turned on my cell phone camera and began running toward the object to take pictures. my friend stayed closer to the car and continued observing. we watched the object flicker for a short time, getting brighter and dimmer while hovering around. i snapped two pictures. they're both timestamped at 9:57 pm. the object appears in both the shots, though the lighting is poor. after i took the pictures, the object appeard to move in a short straight line and got dimmer. when it did, my friend and i simultaneously got a distinct feeling the object was going to disappear, though he and i hadn't said anything. the object then remained stationary, got incrementally dimmer and faded out. 
later on, at 11:30pm, i had driven back to kalamazoo and to work for the night. we hadn't had a chance to talk about what we'd seen, as i didn't want to be late for work at 11:00pm. my friend and i got online and started taking about it. in discussing what we'd seen, my friend said, 
 "it was weird when i knew it was going to disappear."
i agreed with him. i felt the same thing. then we realized we'd had that feeling at the same time, as if we'd had the same thought or feeling "together" somehow. we agree that whatever happened to us was very strange and very difficult to describe.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: My friend and i saw a fireball and experienced some kind of psychological phenomenon.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girl friend were taking a walk around 9:15 p.M.. i saw a very bright flash high in the sky out of the corner of my eye. i immediately looked at the flash and only saw a shiny kind of object moving across the sky. it looked like a dim star on a clear night. i also felt that it was very high by the way it looked. after we watched it for about 40 seconds it almost completely dimmed out. i lost it but my girlfriend did not. i picked it back up within about 10 seconds. it continued across the sky for a couple minutes and then appeared to have stopped in the sky. we stood there for a minute to see if it was going to move, and then we went inside. i have seen things moving across the sky before in and around this same area but i have never seen that bright flash before.
content.summary: A light shine bright. i looked ,and saw oblect move across sky vevy high.

content.detailedDescription:
This morning, 05/16/2014, between approximately 1000 hours, and 1100 hours, i see four f-16s approaching my home crime the east, heading  westbound. 
as they got a little closer, i thought it would be pretty cool to snap a couple of pics. all i had on me was my iphone 5. 
i snapped the first as they approached, then two more as they came overhead. 
immediately after taking the pics, i naturally looked at them to see how they came out. 

the first pic, as they were coming from the west, had something 'weird' in th middle. 

it was at a distinctly lower altitude. there was not other air traffic in the area. no birds, nothing. 

i've tried running it through clarity filters, inverting the colors, etc. 

it appears to be metallic, but i just can't tell. 

i never physically saw the thing. it just showed up in the photo. 

any help you could give would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: I have no idea what it could be. the pic shows the object and four f-16s.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out taking picture of the planes heading into the air force base and when they stopped coming i decided to go home but was still watching the sky then i saw it silently come across the sky.  the sun was setting and the pink from the sunset was reflecting off of it or i may have never noticed it.  it had a a light shadow under it.  if the sky was just blue and white i may have never of noticed it.  it moved across the sky low to the ground until i could no longer see it.  moving maybe about 25 miles per hour.  

i was very excited to see it and ran home to get my son but it was gone all ready. i also asked neighbors if the saw it and they did not see it.  

i knew it was a possible ufo the moment i saw it but living near the air force base made me question if it was something they could have.  it was not in the planes flight path they take.  it was just moving silently across the sky. 

i saw a ufo in the 60's for 45 minutes and it did things that today i have not seen any thing do, but have not seen anything since i was a child until this sighting.

in the photo below it would be near the trees in the center of the picture but unfortunately you cannot see it.
content.summary: The sun was setting and i was out taking picture of the planes that were going land at the airforce base when they stopped coming i decided to walk home but still watching the sky then i saw it sliently go across the sky it blended in but the sun was sett

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on highway 25 between statesboro, ga, and millen, ga, when i saw a bright light to my northeast. at first, i thought it was a planet. suddenly, it grew brighter, and brighter, and appeared orange-red, almost flame-like. it then split into three distinct lights, before disappearing. i did not observe it move in a direction or descend/ascend. after observing for 10 seconds, it disappeared.

i'm a reporter for the fox station in augusta, ga, and was driving home from florida.

i stopped in millen to see a co-worker of mine, who was reporting on a hostage situation in the town. about 45 minutes after my encounter, she called me and informed me that she had seen a similar phenomenon. in her case, she described the multiple lights "stacking" as if in formation. her sighting was to the south of her. this was have put the object in the same place i saw it, while i was looking northeast, driving south of millen.

it truly was bizarre. i have asked fort gordon if they had any exercises going on, and they were not aware of any.
content.summary: Bright light, growing in intensity, breaks into multiple lights

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i went camping along with some friends the weekend of april 26th, 2014 at big bear,ca. there was a great view of the mountain ranges and sunset so we went. for whatever reason we took some pictures of the range, and sunset. although we didn't see this object in person while taking the pictures or watching the sunset, later on we looked back and saw a glowing orb like sphere in them. in some pictures it looks round with a green glow, and in some it "flattens" out and has little shapes inside of it. the object looks as if it is stationary in the trees, then it "takes off" for lack of a better term. these pictures disturb us because we didnt see it in person yet they showed up on camera. if you could please take a look at them i would greatly appreciate it.Maybe someone can explain what was out there that day.
content.summary: Watching sunset, taking pictures, saw in pictures

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i was walking up my road from the shop when a middle aged lady, turns out to be neighbour, asked me what those lights were. i looked at the blueish lights dancing around in the clouds and said "probably a light show, but thanks, interesting" then i went indoor got my cellphone alerted girl friend and we took pics and vids. my theory was lasers or light show from ground but  we could see no beams shining up. short story i was puzzled enough to report this as unidentified. if anyone can tell me of a light show west of sw14 london on 8/5/2014 i can explain it to my neighbour.

in faith,

rsleepy
content.summary: Fuzy lights in the sky, probably some rave kight show but my neighbour asked me what they were, i alerted my girl friend and none of us could quite see hoew the lightshow was projected, i have seen lightshows projected into clouds before. maybe this was o

content.detailedDescription: I was getting into my car when i noticed a bright flash in the sky, i looked up at about 80 degrees (about a mile away) and noticed the light loose it's brightness but kept a steady brightness. after slowing down the light moved directly across the path of a small airplane, and a distant star, then the light slightly changed direction and increased speed and altitude and a phenomenal rate. this light quickly dissipated. no sound, no emissions, no blinking lights. i'm sure the people in the plane should have seen it. and if anyone else was looking up at the sky that night. it was a very bright light. and it was able to change speed very quickly.
content.summary: Bright like appears at high speed, slows, then accelerates at extreme speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was always at my grandmothers house that was at the top of a hill in an area called 5 points in hamilton, ohio. this was more than 1 time and possibly more than 3 times. my recollection after more than 60 years is a little fuzzy. 
i felt like a bowling ball was put in my mouth so i could not scream or yell for help. i did not feel like it affected my breathing. i floated in a horizontal position out an open bedroom window. i was aware of a being standing or floating next to me. 
i mentally said or visualized being frightened but the entity assured me it would be alright. next thing i know i was in a room that was all white and very bright lying on a table or platform.
the bowling ball feeling was gone and the beings mentally 'talked' to me. something like hearing in my brain without words, just images and reassurances that all is ok. 
these incidents happened at least 3 times over a 2 year period. all were very similar in nature. after a while i sort of became 'used' to them and not so frightened.
i feel over the years i have been 'tracked' or watched. so when i was about 35 years old i mentally tried to contact whomever these entities were. i made contact one night about 11 pm after trying for several nights to do this.
the incident scared me so much i never tried to do it again. i don't remember anything except that i was very scared and 'instructed' not to do this again. i know how ridiculous this whole thing must sound as i reread what i have typed here. at 67 years old i feel i must tell someone about these things. being nearer to the end of life than in the middle, i just wanted to get it off my chest.
i have copd and am facing a double lung transplant this summer(2014). that is a risky operation so this is another factor in my reporting these things.
i have not ever read or heard about anyone else having the bowling ball in mouth effect so maybe this is something new.
i hope this report helps in proving or disproving the alien theory.
content.summary: This happened multiple times in the 1950's to me. i floated out bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription: The moon was super bright and large and i wanted to get a picture of it so i went inside and grabbed my cellphone and went back outside in my front yard and as i put the phone up to snap picture...I see this object that quickly materialized as in came into frame and it scared me and i snapped the picture as a knee-jerk reaction or i would have missed it had i second guessed what i was seeing.  it all happened so fast...It was there and then it was gone!!! it appeared and it disappeared.  it left me scarred and excited after it was over. we are not sure if this could be connected to our original report to mufon case #53611
content.summary: Taking picture of moon and this materialized and came quickly into frame and scared me and i snapped picture as reaction.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside about 9pm to have a smoke.The weather was calm and very few clouds,a star lit night,this light cought my attention,i am within 2 miles of a small airport that also houses nh airguard.But it was silent and  apeared to be very high(20,000 ft or more)but not an aircraft .Straight line travel east to west.The light was a briliant yellow,almost gold in tone,not blinking.Made me think i was veiwing a passing satelite until it slowed,abruptly,turned 90 deg to the right,then resumed its origional speed.Then it stopped for about a half second and turned nw and sped away in an instant.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw what apeared to be a satilite passing overhead heading west,slowed,turned north and paused mid flight,turned nw and sped off

content.detailedDescription: Came out of neighbor's house about 11pm with 3 other people.  we were facing south.  the other lady said look up in the sky.  there were 3 bright orange lights lined up horizontally.  they looked like they were watching us.  we had never seen anything like this.  we watched a short time.  then i ran into the house to get other people to come and look.  at this point the lights took off swiftly and without sound.  it was a cloudy night and we could see an orange light behind the clouds moving up higher and higher toward the northeast.  i was happy other people saw this as it felt unreal.
content.summary: Came out of neighbor's house about 11pm with 2 other people facing south.  three large bright orange light in sky  lined up horizontally like they were watching us.  i ran into house to get other people to see and the light disappeared swiftly with no sou

content.detailedDescription: To whom it may concern, on may 13, i was out in my backyard observing the sky, as i do everynight. i was looking at a full moon and witnessed an object which appeared to come off the moon at about three o'clock and went south towards the bottom of the moon and disappear at about 7. i saw the object  fully lit up by the moon. i am not some crackpot or heavy drug user, i was not drinking that night either. i know that there has always been rumors of an alein base on the dark side of the moon, and based on what i saw the other night, it is possible. it was not a meteor or comet, because there was no tail to be seen.
content.summary: Saw an object appear to fly off the moon

content.detailedDescription: Every time i notice the object(s) it is from dusk to dawn. i took photos and saw objects in photos that i did not notice with my eyes. now, i look for the object(s) and unless it is foggy, cloudy or raining i always see them. i am fully aware that no aircraft of any type are flying in the area. my personal opinion is that these are ufo(s), nothing conventional. the sighting is obvious. i have no idea of how far away these object(s) are from me. they can usually be seen anytime from dusk to dawn. please feel free to give me a call at 334-701-3421.
content.summary: From dusk to dawn every night; can be seen all times when no clouds.

content.detailedDescription: My mother (now deceased) and i were in my car driving from clarion, ia to dows, ia during a summer evening (approximately jul1981). i was driving my 1979 dodge omni 024 into the nw corner of dows, ia when i noticed an unusual object just north of the football field. it was stationary and it was emitting various flashes of light or flame. i thought it was a balloon and my mother agreed. i drove to a gravel road intersection and turned the car around in order to face the object from a sw direction (angled towards the north side of the football field. i shut the engine off and my mother and i got out of the car to observe the object. it was a disk-like object with a center end all around. a cone-shaped top and bottom was seen and various lights and flames were "shooting off" the bottom side of the object. i told my mother that a balloon does not look like the object and no sound was heard. i told my mother to get in the car and that we would drive north along the west side of the football field (on old highway 72) and get closer. we were driving approxmately 10 miles per hour with the windows open. we could not hear anything from the object. when i got to the point where the object was almost directly east of the car the object immediately moved from a stationary position to approximately 5 miles to the nw direction (by the horizon). no noise occurred and i have never seen anything move so quickly with no noise. i was very surprised that no sonic boom occurred, any rush of air or vacuum. i pulled the car onto the shoulder and watched the object in the northern horizon for another 30 seconds and then it disappeared. i have discussed this with some fellow engineers and it appears that the propulsion system was anti-gravitational with some ability to control the effects of acceleration/deceleration.
content.summary: Ufo with anti-gravitational propulsion-like acceleration

content.detailedDescription: I woke up to a pulsating sound outside my bedroom window. i observed a small yellow orb on my wall and had a loud ringing in my left ear. at this same time my daughter woke up and was calling me. i went to her room and her lamp was on, when she walked past the lamp the bulb blew. she has frequently told me about yellow orbs in the past. it's been over a week and my head still hurts from the ringing.
content.summary: Heard a pulsating sound outside my window, observed a yellow orb in my room. had a loud ringing in my left ear.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was in my front of my friend`s house, we were just doing regular gossiping.
2.Its bright sparkling light and hovering activities.But it was no the time when stars glow so well.And it was clear seen with no cloud at that time.
3.I thought it was some kinds of satellite or any planet like mars or saturn.
4.The object was floating and hovering in non uniform way. the most important think that marks it as ufo that is it was hovering at the height were no aeroplanes reached and no satellite come up so close.
5.I was no so surprised because it was my 2nd experience like this because i had seen this type of things before. first time i seen at very late night from my roof of my building were again very much glowing but very very much far three ufos was floating and randomly changes its distance an light intensity an light color, sometimes red or blues-green.
6.After 20-30 min a foggy cloud came up close and after 3-4 min the cloud passes and ufo was lost but that time it was also dark outside and then nothing being seen clearly and ufo was not seen after passing of cloud/
content.summary: It was suddenly catch by my eyes. it was hover little up, sometimes left or shfted little right. it was an ufo because it was like the position were no aeroplane reached and no sattelite came so close. it was very evening and the sky was redish orangy

content.detailedDescription:
i was on patrol, heading south and stopping at the stop sign on 272nd. (at the bowling ally) i notice three bright lights towards the south east over the lake goodwin area. the lights were not moving. i sat there and watch the lights, i pointed them to my passenger, a 16 or 17 year old girl whom was doing a ride a long. her mother worked for the department.  
   the middle light, which was lower in position went out. several seconds the left light went out. the left light came on then the middle light came on. the lights moved as soon as the lights came on. we watched as it approached and went above us at about 2-3000 feet. there was no flashing red or anti collision lights. there was no sound. as it passed i saw the light shining to the front. for some reason i could not make out the shape of the object behind the lights. i watched the lights till they faded away. the direction was towards the naval air station  whidbly island. i did make a computer picture of what i saw, i am unable to locate it at this time. i will keep looking.

pjb
content.summary: Three lights, middle light blinked off, then left light went off, came back on the the middle light came on, then it moved from hovering to moving right overhead, no anti collision lights were observed. flew approximately 2-3000 feet over head no sound

content.detailedDescription: Thursday may 15th 2014 around 9:30 - 10:00pm ) i was walking today by home depot and target are at lindbergh in atlanta ga, i was talking to a friend on the phone and as i was walking i suddenly saw this very bright light moving rather slow, it was bright and it seemed to have a light tail, it was decending and moving slow, i could tell right away it was something and not from here ( not human made ) as soon as i saw it i got goose bumps all over my body and it stopped me in my track, i could defiantly tell right away that this is not man made, and if it is, then the government is hiding some serious technology. i think a shooting star could of been a possibility as well, but i think a shooting star would of been moving a lot quicker, and as close as it was to me im sure it would of burned out by then, matter of fact it was a different type of light, it was like a light when you're welding but very fine, so im defiantly ruling that adea out. its very hard to describe exactly what i saw, i wish my friends had seen this because they all think im crazy but this has had such an impact on me i'm just thinking about it a lot. it was so close and i was looking at it and knew for sure that someone is probably looking back at me. but it has had a such an impact on me i just want an explanation an answer. if anyone else would of seen this they would be saying the same thing. that light was about 300-500 feet of the ground as it was moving it had a light tail ( trail ) and descending very slow and moving in one direction, then it just suddenly vanished, the whole experience was about 15 to 20 seconds. i wanted to take a picture but having a password on my iphone and trying to open everything on my phone before i knew it , it was gone. this universe is so big our mind can't even comprehend how big it really is, we are like a grain of sand on the beach thats how small we are, so we defiantly can't be the only life out there, i have believed this for a very long time now, so to finally see something that i saw today is just amazing ( incredible ) i believe our mind is capable of creating such a device maybe 200 to 600 years from now. there for there is something out there that is very intelligent and they don't want to show themselves to the world because we are ugly, dangerous, deceivers, killerswho wants to be a part of that?
content.summary: Bright light moving slow and descending then just suddenly vanished

content.detailedDescription: We were outside looking for my phone in the car then we got a phone call from our cousin uncle, he said look towards over here then we seen a bright light it looked like a missle fly through the air to hit the triangular craft, then a big yellow explosion came... 4 lights came out the bottom jets started to follow them. that's all we saw.
content.summary: Jets have been flying around all day and we have been seeing weird lights i think that a fighter jet shot it then a big yellow cloud came, 4 or around there lights flew out the bottom
